description: A 31-year-old man was stabbed in the leg during a brawl in Liverpool, police say.
title: Seven charged over street fight stabbing
title_page: Seven charged over street fight stabbing in Liverpool - BBC News
maintext:
Seven men have been charged after a man was stabbed in the leg during a street fight.
A 31-year-old man was attacked at the junction of Hold Road and Edge Lane in Kensington, Liverpool, just after 22:00 GMT on 27 February, Merseyside Police said.
Ghalib Habibi, 18, of Toxteth, has been charged with wounding with intent, possession of an offensive weapon and violent disorder.
He and six other men, who have also been charged with violent disorder, are expected to appear at Liverpool Crown Court later this month.
